name: Giant Bomb - Great Balloon Adventure
description:
The giant bomb team wants to meet up for the site's 10th anniversary but how will they meet if they don't have the money to fly cross coast. Good thing for the team Vinny got hot air balloon for both the east and west coast so they can meet up halfway between San Fran and New York.  Use the space bar to propel the balloon upwards and to avoid the baddies.

This game was made for the Giant Rom V game jam.  This is my first game I have made and first time using construct 2.  I am Sir_Lizardman on Giantbomb 

Music created by the Hamster Alliance.
